content: षाड्गुण्यं [षड् गुणा एव ष्यञ्] {@--1@} The collection of six qualities. {@--2@} Six expedients to be used by a king, six measures of royal policy; षाड्गुण्यमुपयुंजीत शक्त्यपेक्षी रसायनं <ls>Śi. 2. 93</ls>; see under गुण also. {@--3@} Multiplication of anything by six. {@--4@} Six properties.
